00028 #include <QtDebug>
00029 #include "brisamsearchclientcp.h"
00030 
00031 #ifdef Q_WS_X11
00032 #include <arpa/inet.h>
00033 #include <netinet/in.h>
00034 #else
00035 #include <winsock2.h>
00036 #include <ws2tcpip.h>
00037 #endif
00038 #include <string.h>

00040 using namespace BrisaUpnp;
00041 
00042 static const QString UPNP_MSEARCH_DISCOVER = "M-SEARCH * HTTP/1.1\r\n"
00043                                              "HOST: 239.255.255.250:1900\r\n"
00044                                              "MAN: \"ssdp:discover\"\r\n"
00045                                              "MX: %1\r\n"
00046                                              "ST: %2\r\n"
00047                                              "\r\n";
00048 
00049 BrisaMSearchClientCP::BrisaMSearchClientCP(QObject *parent,
00050         const QString &serviceType, int serviceMx) :
00051     QObject(parent), running(false), type(serviceType), mx(QByteArray::number(
00052             serviceMx)), SSDP_ADDR("0.0.0.0"), SSDP_PORT(1900), S_SSDP_PORT(
00053             "1900") {
00054     udpListener = new QUdpSocket(this);
00055     connect(udpListener, SIGNAL(readyRead()), this, SLOT(datagramReceived()));
00056 
00057     timer = new QTimer(this);
00058     connect(timer, SIGNAL(timeout()), this, SLOT(discover()));
00059 }
00060 
00061 BrisaMSearchClientCP::~BrisaMSearchClientCP() {
00062     if (isRunning())
00063         stop();
00064 
00065     delete udpListener;
00066     delete timer;
00067 }
00068 
00069 void BrisaMSearchClientCP::discover() {
00070     QString discoverMessage = UPNP_MSEARCH_DISCOVER.arg(QString(mx), type);
00071 
00072     qDebug() << "BrisaMSearch discover message sent";
00073 
00074     udpListener->writeDatagram(discoverMessage.toUtf8(), QHostAddress(
00075             "239.255.255.250"), 1900);
00076 }
00077 
00078 void BrisaMSearchClientCP::doubleDiscover() {
00079     discover();
00080     discover();
00081 }
00082 
00083 bool BrisaMSearchClientCP::isRunning() const {
00084     return running;
00085 }
00086 
00087 void BrisaMSearchClientCP::start(int interval) {
00088     if (!isRunning()) {
00089         if (!udpListener->bind(QHostAddress(SSDP_ADDR), 1900)) {
00090             // TODO remove these magic numbers!
00091             for (qint32 i = 49152; i < 65535; ++i) {
00092                 if (udpListener->bind(QHostAddress(SSDP_ADDR), i)) {
00093                     break;
00094                 }
00095             }
00096         }
00097 
00098         running = true;
00099         timer->start(interval * 1000);
00100 
00101         qDebug() << "BrisaMSearch started - interval: " << interval << "";
00102 
00103     } else {
00104         qDebug() << "BrisaMSearch already started!";
00105     }
00106 }
00107 
00108 void BrisaMSearchClientCP::stop() {
00109     if (isRunning()) {
00110 
00111         udpListener->disconnectFromHost();
00112         running = false;
00113         timer->stop();
00114 
00115         qDebug() << "BrisaMSearch stopped!";
00116 
00117     } else {
00118         qDebug() << "BrisaMSearch already stopped!";
00119     }
00120 }
00121 
00122 void BrisaMSearchClientCP::datagramReceived() {
00123     while (udpListener->hasPendingDatagrams()) {
00124 
00125         QByteArray Datagram;
00126 
00127         Datagram.resize(udpListener->pendingDatagramSize());
00128         udpListener->readDatagram(Datagram.data(), Datagram.size());
00129 
00130         QString temp(Datagram);
00131         QHttpResponseHeader *response = new QHttpResponseHeader(temp);
00132 
00133         if (response->statusCode() == 200) {
00134             QString usn = response->value("usn");
00135             if (usn.startsWith("uuid:")) {
00136                 qDebug() << "BrisaMSearch received MSearch answer from "  << usn << "";
00137                 emit msearchResponseReceived(response->value("usn"),
00138                                              response->value("location"),
00139                                              response->value("st"),
00140                                              response->value("ext"),
00141                                              response->value("server"),
00142                                              response->value("cache-control"));
00143             } else {
00144                 qDebug() << "BrisaMSearch received MSearch from " << response->value("location")
00145                          << " but it does not start with string \"uuid:\". USN field is " << usn;
00146             }
00147         }
00148 
00149         delete response;
00150     }
00151 }
